author: @kpblcaoo

metadata.description: Conceptual ideas repository for project development

summary: Repository of project concepts and development ideas

ideas.title: Context-Aware LLM Orchestration
ideas.description: Intelligent system for managing LLM interactions with context hierarchy and token optimization
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo
ideas.implementation_notes: Implemented in init.json with 4-level context hierarchy

ideas.title: Multi-Stage Workflow Automation
ideas.description: Automated workflow system with safety boundaries and performance monitoring
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo
ideas.implementation_notes: Implemented in cli_queue.json with comprehensive workflow engine

ideas.title: Smart Cache Management
ideas.description: Intelligent caching system for context optimization and performance enhancement
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo
ideas.implementation_notes: Partially implemented in CLI, needs backend development

ideas.title: Dynamic Schema Validation
ideas.description: Real-time validation system for JSON configurations with auto-correction suggestions
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo
ideas.potential_implementation: JSON schema validator with ML-based correction suggestions

ideas.title: Cross-Language Parser Enhancement
ideas.description: Enhanced parser supporting multiple programming languages with unified AST
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo

ideas.title: Automated Project Structure Maintenance
ideas.description: Self-updating project structure through intelligent parsing and change detection
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo
ideas.implementation_notes: Implemented auto_update_struct.py with Git hooks and cron integration

ideas.title: Hybrid IDE Integration
ideas.description: Seamless integration with VSCode Copilot for enhanced development experience
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo

ideas.title: Modular CLI Architecture
ideas.description: Refactored CLI with modular, extensible architecture for better maintainability
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo
ideas.implementation_notes: Created modular CLI structure with cli_core, cli_commands, cli_utils, cli_config

ideas.title: Contextual Workflow Orchestration
ideas.description: Advanced workflow system with smart context management and real-time adaptation
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo
ideas.implementation_notes: Combining auto-update, CLI workflow, and context management

ideas.title: CLI Plugin Ecosystem
ideas.description: Extensible plugin system for CLI with custom commands, workflows, and integrations
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo

implementation_roadmap: Design plugin interface and registration system
Create plugin discovery and loading mechanism

ideas.title: Extendable struct.json Format
ideas.description: Add support for extensions in struct.json to enable modular functionality and plugin architecture
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo
ideas.implementation_notes: Requires parser enhancement (TSK-006), adds extensibility to core format

ideas.title: Multimodal struct.json Support
ideas.description: Support for images and text in struct.json to enable rich documentation and visual code analysis
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo
ideas.implementation_notes: Builds on IDEA-041 extensibility, requires multimodal processing pipeline

ideas.title: Automated Idea Validation
ideas.description: Automatic validation of ideas for duplicates and logical consistency to improve data quality
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo
ideas.implementation_notes: Successfully implemented via comprehensive_consolidator.py - achieved 68.4% duplicate detection rate and 156x efficiency improvement in data sorting. Core validation functions operational and battle-tested on 354 total items.
next_steps: Add semantic similarity scoring for near-duplicates
Create manual review interface for corrupted files
Integration with real-time data entry validation

ideas.title: Data Sorter Plugin Integration
ideas.description: Manual file-by-file processing of temp_workfiles/unsorted_mess/ using existing JSON orchestration system rather than standalone scripts
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo
ideas.implementation_notes: Leverage existing 4-layer context system and artifact management for manual sorting
next_steps: Process unsorted JSON files manually using context system
Cross-reference with current tasks.json and ideas.json

ideas.title: AI Agent CLI Training Framework
ideas.description: Comprehensive training system for AI agents to efficiently interact with llmstruct CLI, including pattern recognition, command optimization, and self-improvement mechanisms
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo
ideas.goal: Enable AI agents to work seamlessly and efficiently with CLI layer
ideas.implementation_notes: Build upon existing CLI audit command and command processor architecture
success_metrics: Consistent CLI usage patterns across sessions
Clear documentation of optimal command sequences

ideas.title: Unified CLI-API Architecture Design
ideas.description: Design future REST/GraphQL API layer that seamlessly integrates with existing CLI infrastructure, sharing core logic and maintaining consistency
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo
ideas.goal: Create unified backend that serves both CLI and API interfaces
ideas.implementation_notes: Leverage existing CommandProcessor and CLI infrastructure as foundation
api_features: RESTful endpoints for all CLI commands

ideas.title: Enhanced Documentation Cross-Reference System
ideas.description: Systematic linking between documentation, tasks, and ideas with automated validation and placeholder management for future documentation needs
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo
ideas.goal: Create comprehensive and maintainable documentation ecosystem
ideas.implementation_notes: Build upon existing docs.json structure and audit command functionality

ideas.title: Split insights and ideas into separate files (insights.json)
ideas.description: Refactor project data model: move insights (metrics, analytics, project health, statistics) into a dedicated insights.json, keep ideas.json for conceptual and feature ideas only.
ideas.author: @ai-copilot
ideas.implementation_notes: Required for better separation of analytics and creative planning. Will simplify future automation and reporting.

ideas.title: Automate custom field assignment in GitHub Projects via Actions/API
ideas.description: Implement GitHub Action or webhook to automatically set custom fields (e.g., Type: Task/Idea) for new project items using GraphQL API.
ideas.author: @ai-copilot
ideas.implementation_notes: Will allow full Kanban automation and reduce manual work after export.

ideas.title: CLI CRUD для задач и идей (tasks.json, ideas.json)
ideas.description: Добавить в модульный CLI команды для создания, редактирования, удаления и просмотра задач и идей напрямую из командной строки. Пример: /task add, /task update, /idea add, /idea update и т.д.
ideas.author: @kpblcaoo
ideas.implementation_notes: Запрос пользователя на расширение CLI для полноценного управления задачами и идеями без ручного редактирования JSON.
benefits: Ускорение работы с задачами и идеями
Возможность автоматизации и интеграции с другими инструментами
